title: Online Medical Terminology Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology and human anatomy understanding
context.additional_context: Non-real-time educational course optimized for smartphone-based learning environments. Developing medical terminology proficiency through enhanced interaction and retrieval practice during learning.

learning_goals: Medical terminology can be accurately used at a sentence level applicable to real clinical contexts
Achieve over 90% participation in medical terminology learning through weekly quizzes and peer feedback activities
Score 85 points or higher on the final comprehensive evaluation at course completion
Record learner satisfaction of 4.0/5.0 or higher in the course satisfaction survey

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
